website_summaries.verdict: Modern designed black table and chairs with a glass top will bring a touch of elegance into any décor.
pros: It is constructed of heavy-duty, rust-resistant steel that has been powder coated to protect it and lengthen its life
The chair backs are properly curved to provide you with the maximum amount of support and comfort
cons: It is smaller than it looks in the pictures
You will be bumping knees if four adults sit at the table at the same time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Table looks really nice. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eillen Cuatriz

customer_reviews.title: Not made for a large space area
customer_reviews.text: It had like two scratches but overall super nice worth it but not made for a large space area more for small space
customer_reviews.author: Tazhane yvette TIBBS

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- ALOT SMALLER THAN PICTURES!  NOT easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Terribly heavy top. Need 2 people to put together. Pieces were chipped or dinged. table ended up being TINY. A KIDS table. BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your apt. Affordable and still chic sexy. Sturdy. Great packaging to keep parts protected during shipping. Mine came with a scratch on the glass top. No big deal though, it's small and barely noticeable. Took about 30 minutes to put table together, an hour for first chair, and then 10ish minutes for the rest of the chairs. Read the instructions and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Siretha Buggs

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble...when the holes line up and when the screws aren’t bent. Not to mention it to me an extra week to receive all of my hardware because it was forgotten in the box. Upon putting it together, it felt very unsteady, not all legs touch the ground, the suction cups are weak and altogether I am very dissatisfied with my purchase. Also, there’s a “bonnlo” logo on the TOP of your table. Don’t get this if you value comfortably sitting in a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Aerie

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap dining set
customer_reviews.text: There was an issue when I tried to buy the table & the vendor responded to me within 24 hours. My set was finally ordered 7/19. A few days after my order was made my table & chairs was shipped, my estimated delivery date was 8/3-11 & it ended up coming 7/25. Instructions were pretty easy for both the table & chairs, I just wish the seat cushions had predrilled holes to make it easier (you’ll need a drill, not mentioned in the instructions). The table is on the small side & straight out of packaging the chairs also look very low but they fit my 5’8 frame perfectly. Overall I LOVE my new dining set.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is amazing. If you have a problem, just let them know and they will take care of you. I'm satisfied with my table now and I enjoy sitting at it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shiny, pretty side of table top has manufacturers name on it. Several washers and one suction cup missing. Two support bolts split. No way to close gaps between glass and frame. Otherwise, fairly easy to put together. A little smaller than what I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The size of table is working for my needs. But, I am not happy with the chairs. They are not comfortable to seat on for a medium size adults. The back of the chair is terrible on your own back.
customer_reviews.author: Olga S.

customer_reviews.title: overall great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the chairs, very easy set up. I didnt want anything expensive due to my children if they mess it up oh well it was cheap set! The table came a few hours later it took me about 15 mins to set up very simple and easy. The glass wasn’t that heavy but depending on your strength it can take two people. Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Shantell samuels

customer_reviews.title: The best table ever
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Is perfect for small spaces, modern style and easy to assemble. Their customer service is really good. I received the table broken and they answer and help us really fast. 5 stars but if have 6 I would give to them!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: It's smaller than we thought
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with the table, and it's probably our fault for not paying attention to the dimensions in the description, is that the table itself is pretty small. It's nice-looking, it seems sturdy, and it was easy to put together. But if you have 4 people actually trying to eat on this table it's really cramped as far as table space. The chairs are normal size, so we just thought it would be a size that is compatible with having 4 people at the table. Other than the size, there's really no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice table, easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really likes this table. Chairs seem sturdy. I put this together all by myself too. Did come in 2 pkgs which were about 3 days apart. This table looks really nice and is easy to clean. A couple of my chairs had some weird brown stuff, and one was a stain but I just moved those to the back out of sight. I like this set alot.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I do not complain. This is my first star being 1. I set this table up the beginning for May 2019, its the end of May and the chairs ALL 4 's legs are bending. Not put together study AT ALL> 1 of the chairs leg broke completely off. NO , no one heavy sat in it. I wish I could return this table. I wish I had went with a different table. Like I said, these chairs are very disappointing. They are not welded together and weak.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The level of service and communication about the issues I had was amazing. The level of customer service received was exceptional. I recommend anyone buying from this seller not to second guess yourselves. With all the issue I had with the carrier the sellers accommodations were fair. Although my experience was awful with fedex was awful I appreciated everything that was done on the sellers end. Again service was great and I can now enjoy the item purchase. The piece is very nice for the price and a nice size to fill a small space.
customer_reviews.author: CHRYSTAL BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Love this dining set. Perfect size for my nook area. Sleek and modern looking! It was easy to assemble, took less than an hour. But be aware that this set ships out in different packages and they do not arrive the same day. Customer service was helpful but did not realize this or explained this so it appeared that everything was delivered although it was not. A lot of back and forth with the order. Otherwise, the confusion and frustration was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and Unsafe for any age!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was disappointing and not what I was expecting. I bought this for our “Adult Family” to use, but seems to be more fitting for our “Grandchildren,” but they can’t use it either. The table top is glass, which is held on by 4 little suction cups. The suctions are maybe the size of a dime. The table frame and along with chair frames are flimsy to say the least. This is an Unsafe piece of furniture if you have any children or children that stop by, its even unsafe for adults. Do not buy it!!! What a shame, I threw it right in the trash. I didn’t want to send it back knowing how extremely unsafe that was.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to start by saying that the table is beautiful. HOWEVER.....the chairs are absolute garbage. Within just over a month, 3 of the four chairs have broken. So now we have a kitchen table with one chair....completely pointless. How are we supposed to sit down to a family supper with one chair???? I am extremely angry and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gehlhoff

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Table and Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are like toothpicks, they are lightweight and cheap. Sturdy enough for small people, it will do the job at my house for a short period of time until I can afford a new set. I am disappointed to have company over who is heavier or taller probably won't hold them up. The good things about the dining set are it was easy to assemble, small enough for my dining area, and the style is nice just wished the chairs were sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: DIY LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Nice but really small
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than I expected it, it’s big for 2 and too small for 4. This is a 3 x2 feet table. The quality is good not great, but for the price you can’t complain. Be aware that it is really small dinning table the pictures make it look bigger. The surface space is only enough for plates, can’t put serving plate in the center
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect card table . . . I do eat dinner there also.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dave

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: The problem is this is very difficult to clean. The seats and table are not made to have food spilled on (if you have kids). Also' there is a spot between the back and bottom of the seats that looks strange as well as a space between the glass and end of table. It's all about how you put it together. I think it's impossible to put it together exactly
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: No directions given and not stable
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs look great... however they are not sturdy and it was insanely difficult to assemble. We weren’t given directions for how to assemble the chairs so it became a possible and we basically had to guess on what to do. Also half of the chairs assemble to be completely uneven and quite frankly unusable. There is a gap between the glass of the table and the frame and there is nothing you can do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sinder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks, very nice... a bit short on the height but its nice... the suction cup thingy's that hold the glass in place are kinda suck and not in the functional way...they dont fit in the holes very well...and just aren't made very well...silica dots might be a better option...but I do live the table and for the price its fab!
customer_reviews.author: Lady.de.Muerte

customer_reviews.title: Attractive dining set
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely in a small dining area. Looks modern. Assembly involved drilling to place 4 screws in each chair seat. Had to eyeball where to drill holes. First seat not done properly, but improved for remaining 3 chair seats. Not particularly sturdy, but good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The table looks very nice! It is kind of small. The chairs are very cheaply made and wobble. It is a pain in the ass to assemble them and they sent me a part that needs to be circle on both ends to connect and one of them was flat. Table and chairs do not come in one box
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy cheap , wait then buy better
customer_reviews.text: chair quality is very bad, I try to save some money now I regret. I should read a few more reviews. The table is okay and I am okay with that at the price. I feel better instead sitting floor compare to the floor. I wish they give half the money back because return and packing will extra time waste. Please choose wisely, cheap is not always better.
customer_reviews.author: kazi kabir

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together and the tools came with it. Only other thing I needed was a drill to mount the cushion to the frame. I’m not a handy person and was able to put this together and only needed a second person to turn the table back upright after the legs were put on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Build Quality and full marks to customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the build quality. Exactly as shown in the picture. Easy to assemble and customer service support team is very helpful and cooperative. It took me around 60-70mins to fully assemble it with ease and fun. When i ordered, the glass top had few bubbles and spots. The customer service was so cooperative and pro-active that they send me a whole new table as replacement right away and i got the new glass top. Thanks. I am so impressed and i really appreciate the dedication and honesty from the seller. Full stars to the product as well as the seller. Kudos !!!
customer_reviews.author: faizan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are so cheap. Came loaded w a white dusty film on them. So cheap looking and crooked in appearance. Buyer beware! If this implant is any good, they’ll give me half my money back, as the table was “ ok”, the chairs wreck it!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time. NO SCRATCHES OR SCUFF MARKS. Very easy to assemble. Hardest thing was cleaning up all the little styrofoam pieces off the floor. Took me about 1.5 hrs to assemble and clean up. Very elegant for a small space. Chairs and table are very sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Britanie

customer_reviews.title: Don't but the set with the chairs.
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics is nice but it's almost impossible to put the chairs together and they are less sturdy than a house of cards. One of the chairs legs have bent under the chair and it took the back with it. My advice: skip the sad excuse for chairs and just get the table. The table is stunning and not too big but big enough to serve it's function.
customer_reviews.author: Marz

customer_reviews.title: Really uncomfortable charirs
customer_reviews.text: The quality is really cheap, the chairs don't seem like they will hold a heavy set guest. Chairs super uncomfortable. Its better to save another $150 and buy decent set. Disappointing pictures looked appealing. Had a few inch scratch on the glass table.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Trach

customer_reviews.title: Dining room table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small dining room area. It’s exactly what it looks like in the picture and super easy to assemble. I did it by myself and it took me like 2 hours (taking my time) literally with breaks in between.
customer_reviews.author: Bre'Andrea Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bob the builder w/o proper parts
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is not the tableSet you want if you don’t have time to put it together. Chairs(4) arrived a day before the table which came missing 3 of the parts on the parts list. I tried to google the parts and even google is confused By what I’m looking for. If you have the time and all the pieces good for you, but I didn’t have the pieces when I had the time now I’m upset and have 4 chairs with no table up yet 🤦🏽‍♂️ Got a lot of Allen keys though
customer_reviews.author: LeDarrius TaVon Deloatch

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: The item came in a timely matter. Was packaged nicely. Easy to put together. Finding it to be satisfactory for the time being. Didn’t look at this piece as an investment but wanted something we didn’t mind paying for in the meantime and that looked nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Tiki 💃🏽

customer_reviews.title: still waiting for customer service to rectify
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price but 2 chairs the mounting screws for the back are stripped and wont tighten and glass top came scratched and still waiting for customer service to rectify
customer_reviews.author: jameskoiman

customer_reviews.title: Table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Nice table arrived early but now i can't do anything for a week bc i never got the bolts or screws to put it together. Finally got the parts and still missing a washer. But over all nice table. never got a 25 dollar refund as promised for waiting for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole t

customer_reviews.title: Looks good...little complex to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product for eat-in-kitchen! Looks nice and classy, slightly on the delicate side, but really happy with this table. You need to be careful while assembling because the chair assembly instructions are vague, one mistake can make the chair wobbly. I had to dissemble a few parts and reassemble them.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Shore

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Im almost 60 and put it together my self in about an hour. Good small set perfect for my kitchen. Sturdy enough for people maybe up to 200 or so pounds. Comfortable chairs for such an inexpensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Gets you by
customer_reviews.text: Looks great just chairs don’t seem very sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: TChan

customer_reviews.title: Small hole, otherwise great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality for the price. However the reason for 4 stars is because one of the chairs came with a small hole in the fabric. Other than that great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modern, perfect for a minimalist home!
customer_reviews.text: I like this table! I’ve never ordered a table online, but I am pleasantly surprised with this. It shipped very quickly and I really like how simple and modern it is, and that it easily fits into my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.text: This table is crap. I opened and assembled, first time I sat in one of the chairs it buckled (I weigh 140). The table scratches easily and the chairs and table itself are tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: 5 piece set for me not 7 piece 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago now it’s 2020 and I’m realizing it came with only 4 chairs wouldn’t that make it a 5 piece set 😂 oh well the chairs are very light so I wouldn’t buy it if you have little ones running around or if you’re a bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for kitchen in a Apartment
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together it came 3 days earlier than expected it does come in 2 separate boxes I thought I got cheated at first lol very beautiful set I'm satisfied and the seller responds quickly to your questions
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Fun little table and great looking, but the chairs after a month of use already sound a little squeaky
customer_reviews.author: Becka Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I really need the screws to complete the set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter she just got her 1st home and she really likes it but one of the chairs didn’t have any screws to it Each chair had a pack with Alan wrench and screws except for one chair if you all could please just send me the screws for the chair It would be greatly appreciate it
customer_reviews.author: Shanaye Scott

customer_reviews.title: cheap chairs
customer_reviews.text: chairs are really cheap made but they doing the job the tabel is really pretty tho
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Mings

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great table. Pretty sturdy and easy to assemble. It fits great in smaller areas
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so dissatisfied. In the process of building the table .. I was missing screws for both my chairs and table . Like that’s ridiculous. How do you expect me to build something with no screws. The table has scratches on it . Smh . I was really looking forward to having my table set for my bday and now I can’t . I just want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Cee

customer_reviews.title: Good for now
customer_reviews.text: Since I moved and needed a dining table badly, I bought this. It is good for now. The table is great but the chairs are a bit wobbly. I tried many times to correct the alignment of the chairs and failed. The chair cushions are nice and I like the hight of the back rest.
customer_reviews.author: Ranga Abeysinghe

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price! Excellent customer service by Bonnlo.
customer_reviews.text: Retracting my comment as Bonnlo has helped me resolve the issue. Table is exactly as pictured. Great if you're on a budget and need a small space. Do not buy if you want something big and heavy. Otherwise, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy comes missing components
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS, I REPEAT DO NOT BUY THIS. It comes with missing screws and you have to return this heavy piece of equipment after it's been unboxed. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD product!
customer_reviews.text: The dinning table is easy to assemble, but you may need two people to do it cause the glass top is heavy for one. Good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: So so look good
customer_reviews.text: Pense que iba hacer mas alta, las sillas so weightless, it’s okay for the value, No money, whatever
customer_reviews.author: Analie S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and build. Nice looking set.
customer_reviews.text: It came in 2 separate boxes. It is a great starter set for a family of four. The dining room table is beautiful. Its like a jet black tempered glass. Very pretty and easy to clean by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Penni

customer_reviews.title: So nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. We like the color and the design. And the chairs looks nice together. I am happy with this Bonnlo 5 pieces dining set Kitchen table. It looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bluelightning

customer_reviews.title: Table is great; chairs could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the table. Chairs are fine but they aren’t as sturdy as the table is. A little improvement on chairs would get this product a 5 star. The chairs leg are really thin feels like can’t take weight. Although it’s been few months now and they are working fine. But there is definitely scope for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Malik

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Had some Hicks up with delivery but finally got it! Worth the money & a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par money wise
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my first house thinking it was going to be very different than it came to be. It was/is not very sturdy and not comfortable to me. Way smaller than expected. Easy to assemble but not worth the money what you pay after tax.
customer_reviews.author: EmC

customer_reviews.title: Shipped the wrong parts !
customer_reviews.text: It was inexpensive and I needed something simple however when I received the table and chairs. The chairs I put together no problem but the table was sent was two of the same sides! Making it extremely challenging to put together and making me question the safety and secureness of it all together .
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This table was perfect for my space, exactly what I wanted. It looks so nice and modern!
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product based on the past reviews. Received defective products, the chairs arises dirty and looks like they have been used! Save your money and look somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Calvin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great table. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The table is exactly as described and perfectly suits our needs as a craft table for 8 year old. One of the chair legs was defective. The seller responded to my email immediately and shipped out replacement parts the next day.
customer_reviews.author: David Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Load capacity.
customer_reviews.text: I have some load bearing questions....lol. Those chairs are just one heavy hinney from collapsing....lol. Although, it is a very good set for a small apartment. It serves the purpose it was intended for. All in all it is a nice little dining set. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: G. JEFFRIES

customer_reviews.title: Good Economical Glass Table Set.
customer_reviews.text: Good economical table set. Suitable for small family. Table assembly was easy but chair assembly was tricky and took much time. Overall assembly took about 2hrs for us.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table I’ve had it for a month now and it is great!ive gotten lost of compliments !
customer_reviews.author: Lina fig

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied very good is the logistics did not carry upstairs too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied very good is the logistics did not carry upstairs too heavy
customer_reviews.author: hana

customer_reviews.title: Decent table for the $
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for what you're spending on this - the quality isn't that bad. The chairs feel a little flimsy (I wish there was more weight to them) The glass does seem to scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the table and the looks expensive for less price
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Too good for its price .very nice comfortable chairs. It’s exactly how the picture is. Loved this one
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Like this item
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Item is small but convenient and cute. Chairs are more of a cream color than white. It’s easy to put together. I received the chairs 8/16 and received the table the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Shanika Watson

customer_reviews.title: Black glass table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Chairs aren’t very sturdy but worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, good product for small places and easy to assemble. Best than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Santana

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it
customer_reviews.text: Putting in the screws straight into the wood for the seat cushions without pre-drilled screw holes seems like an odd design choice, because of this each seat placement is a little off as a result a couple of the chairs are wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy, Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong when buying this product. Easy set up, The chair just take a lil time. Fits perfectly in my little apartment & it’s big enough to use it when I move to a bigger place. The size is just right. Shipping was fast, I received it yesterday and it was supposed to be here a whole nother week later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty online but it's very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike about the product is the chairs are so weak that I will not take a chance to use them at all. I am donating them to a charity. The table is pretty but has scratches in the glass. I would not recommend this product for any type of personal use. It will be a liability to your family and visitors
customer_reviews.author: amanda mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are looking beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs are good and look beautiful. the table is a little small in width.
customer_reviews.author: muralidhar

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I could not assemble my table because the washers,bolts,suction cup,supporting bars and Allen key were all missing out the box. The assembly looks easy. I just can’t because It came with a lot of missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful set. Totally worth it 👍🏾 (It had a minor scratch but no worries) hoping it’ll last a good while
customer_reviews.author: Shiek

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. It looks great. Great size. It came with a scratch on the glass. I don't if it happened through shipping. But overall it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Its small for a large place but perfect for a small area
customer_reviews.text: this was not hard putting together as written in the other reviews. Its small for a large place but perfect for a small area. We love it. Looks classy and modern
customer_reviews.author: Nida Sohail

customer_reviews.title: junk junk
customer_reviews.text: this table was a pice of junk it was chiped in two places wanted to give 15 dollars rebate i ll never buy nothing on line again got a good leasing john leavitt thanks but no thanks
customer_reviews.author: John leavitt john leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Comes with dust
customer_reviews.text: Everything came all at once only thing I kinda dislike is that it’s kinda low but other then that it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table.
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, wish the chairs were sturdier. Will probably replace them with other chairs in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Jai

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in two boxes. It was easy to assemble, both chairs and table. Took about 45-minutes. It fits perfect in my home-based office. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: For the life of me I cannot register it using kindle as well a PC. Get the registration form ix please

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the money paid
customer_reviews.text: I love this dining table. Assembly is somewhat complex but that is acceptable. I love this stylish dining table and chairs. The family felt good comfort while using this table
customer_reviews.author: Madan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and looks nice. Only issue I had is one of the holes to screw in the bottom part of the leg for the table was stripped so I could not secure it there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst table I have ever gotten, The screw holes were too small for the actual screws, screws came broken, the glass was bent and the box was broken apart when it came.
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! It’s like sitting on plastic dollar store chairs. They break easily, the table is so low - looks like a kids table & the chairs are completely flimsy & I have to be cautious when sitting down & I’m 130 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Vences

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together! So elegant and perfect for a small space/apartment. The tempered glass is a nice touch and the platform is sturdy. I definitely recommend this for anyone looking for something decent on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 by mistake, ended up using them both. One of glasses had scratches over it, they seem easy to scratch as well, you get what you pay for, not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for 1 month and the chairs has broken completely. The table is very small but overall it is a nice set but not for the price especially the fact that it is easy to break
customer_reviews.author: Kuuipo Conner

customer_reviews.title: Dining table
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in my dining area and its really nice looks just like the picture a lil smaller than i expected but it works
customer_reviews.author: Dalton whitby

customer_reviews.title: Its glass, so you will always need to wipe it down daily.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, definitely will need a electric screwdriver for the chairs. This is going to look great for kitchen in my new apartment I will be moving into.
customer_reviews.author: shaquita siddle

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was early. The table is fine. However, the chairs a very light and the material is very thin. One of the chairs had a tear on the side of one of the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Deberry

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good value and the chairs are comfortable to sit on. I feel the description should have been more descriptive. I expected a clear glass and received white glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: Bought the table today and it’s not very sturdy.. I pushed a chair in and the leg bent when I went to fix it , it just made it loose. Not very happy with this table .
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: My Husband and I love it. It's perfect for our small dining area... I'm glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Shontel

product_meta.title: Bonnlo 5 Pieces Dining Set Black Dining Table and Chairs Set for 4 Persons,Kitchen Room Glass Table with 4 Chairs
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackEating together is an important part of family living. Whether it's family dinners with your children, siblings, or parents, or dinner parties with your closest friends.4 dining chairs and a large dining table provide ample space for entertaining a small group of family or friends.

Specifications: 
Table: 
1. Material: 8mm Tempered Glass & Iron
2. Dimensions: (47.24 x 27.56 x 29.53)" / (120 x 70 x 75)cm (L x W x H)
3. Tempered Glass Thickness: 0.32" / 8mm 
4. Color: Black
5. Weight: 30.2kg / 66.58 lbs
Chair: 
1. Material: PVC & Iron & Sponge
2. Dimensions: (15.74 x 18.5 x 38.58)" / (40 x 47 x 98)cm (L x W x H) 
3. Color: Black
4. Weight Capacity: 120kg / 265 lbs
5. Weight: 14.8 kg / 32.63 lbs

Package Includes: 
1 x Tempered Glass Dining Table
4x Chairs

Notice:
The glass table is fragile, even though we have strengthen the package very carefully, it could happen that it is broken during the long shipping period.
If you find it is defective or damaged after opening its package, please feel free to contact our after-sales team via email, and we will provide a timely and easy-to-reach support. A photo of defective or damaged item would be better if possible,this would help us to confirm the problem and make solutions faster. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
feature_bullets: NOTICE:Ships and arrives in 2 separate boxes,delivery times may vary per box. Overall Dimensions:Table-47.2"L x 27.6"W x 29.5"H;Chair-15.7”Lx 18.5”W x 38.6”H.

5pcs Dining Set:Are you looking for a modern yet stylish dining set?Try Bonnlo Glass Dining Table with 4 pu leather chairs.A glass top dining table will complement many home decors and instantly brighten your room.
Durable Dining Table:Bonnlo Black Glass Dining Table is constructed of rust-resistant, heavy-duty steel and have been powder coated to increase life spans.Easy to clean with a damp cloth.

4 Uphosltered Dining Chairs:The black leather seat combined with the solid metal frame offers durability that you can enjoy for many years.For maximum quality, re-tighten the screws every other months.
Suitable for:Our dining table set features an ultra-modern design that will help blend in with any decor. Perfect for small apartment, kitchen, dining room, breakfast nook or other limited spaces.
